# Engine Details

Engines may have pre-set default arguments when executing the model fit call. For this type of model, the template of the fit calls are below.

## flexsurv

```{r flexsurv-reg}
surv_reg() %>% 
  set_engine("flexsurv") %>% 
  set_mode("regression") %>% 
  translate()
```

## survival

```{r survival-reg}
surv_reg() %>% 
  set_engine("survival") %>% 
  set_mode("regression") %>% 
  translate()
```

Note that `model = TRUE` is needed to produce quantile predictions when there is 
a stratification variable and can be overridden in other cases.

## Parameter translations

The standardized parameter names in parsnip can be mapped to their original names
in each engine that has main parameters:

```{r echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
parsnip::convert_args("surv_reg")
```
